Fractal Dimention Menu¶

This file handles the saving of rules

class lsystem.core.fract_menu.FractalDimension(ui)¶

Makes the window that allows the user to save rules

add_widgets()¶

Adds the widgets to the layout

calc()¶
init_ui()¶

sets the window title, layout, and adds widgets to the window

Calculation¶

lsystem.boxcounting3d.calc.calc_fractal_dim(n: int, mesh)¶

Calculates the fractal dimensions for nxnxn cubes around the given mesh

lsystem.boxcounting3d.calc.calc_fractal_dim3D(mesh)¶

Wrapper function that calls calc_fractal_dim and narrows in on a good resolution for n

lsystem.boxcounting3d.calc.center_mesh(mesh, n)¶

Centers the 3d mesh in the space of our cube grid
